0.text: Bug 124620  Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted.

1.text: Description: Referenced parameter icon should be invalid if the source parameter in library is deleted.

4.text: 2.Create a report, use the above library.

5.text: In the library explorer, pull the parameter to the data explorer view of report.

6.text: 3.Open the library file, delete the parameter.

7.text: Then reopen the report design file, the icon of parameter seems nothing happened.

8.text: But if those operations happened in dataset, the icon of dataset in the report will be invalid.

10.text: Expected Result: The icon of referenced parameter should be invalid.
